contentList.content:
Characters within [1] of you will be knocked Unconscious instead of dying.

They won't grant XP unless killed until I figure out a fix, so it's a custom toggle now.
Doesn't work on undead, constructs, inanimate objects, dead creatures or anything immune to being knocked out.

Characters within [1] of you are knocked Unconscious instead of dying.

Doesn't work on undead, constructs, inanimate objects, dead creatures or anything immune to being knocked out.
Within your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="NON_LETHAL">Non-Lethal Aura</LSTag> this character will be knocked Unconscious instead of dying.
